text: Ordered at 9:14p. 10:42p still not here. Unacceptable. This is the 2nd time its happened. The 1st time they tried to say it was my fault because they "knocked on the door but nobody answered so they left" but also some how they got lost and couldnt find my house. Mind you i live 0.6 of a mile from this Pizza Hut, so..how?

name: Richard G
text: Pay all you want, they'll take it and not give pizza. Or anything. Thieves. No pizza only taking your money. Corporate are also incompetent and won't help. They will take your money and not give anything. This place is a scam.

text: Placed an order over the phone for delivery took all our info, waited for 50 minutes (supposed to be 40 minutes) called no one put the order in. The kid on the line hung up on me, called back put me on hold right away, then I called again I …More

text: Always friendly customer service. I would like to take myself and friends here more often. Food always tastes amazing and the salad bar is pretty convenient.

text: Had a pizza delivered - my first mistake. Strange little guy showed up in a hatchback and kept trying to look behind me into my house. text: Use to be my favorite pizza place. I go every week. They stopped carrying salami and now they refuse to put cheddar cheese on my pizza. Me and mine will no longer support pizza hut since we cannot have it the way we want it.

name: S P
text: This particular store doesn't seem to accept normal coupons. Always says this store isn't included in this promotion. The normal carry out $7.99. They used to always accept this coupon but haven't since the new year. Not gonna pay $15+ for a pizza hut pizza.

name: Kito Manning
text: Called in to place an order during a work break, and when we got there the pizza was done and ready to go! Wasn't busy at all since we got there around 3:45pm, so service was fast and friendly. Would recommend to a friend any day!

text: There are better local pizza options but its still a great option for those interested in doing the buffet.

name: Karl Hachmuth
text: I never eat-in, but for delivery/carryout it really is good. The pizza customization options are great; the wings and pasta are good, too. I've ordered from here many, many times and only had my order screwed up once (it was promptly fixed and I got a credit for the mistake).
